snippet.title: Volatility Announcement Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Volatility is coming to Steam!

For more info, screens and to wishlist Volatility in preparation for its demo (early fall!): STORE PAGE HERE

Inspired by both modern metroidvanias and adventure games of the '90s and early 2000s, the game sees you conquering a world of dungeons and treasure.
Every newly acquired ability means new ways to interact with your environments like slashing chains, shooting far-away objects and riding on laser beams!
